nodes.text: The Tof bulk cruiser was a warship used by the Tofs.

These bulk cruisers were used by the Tofs as they chased the Nagai from Firefist to the galaxy. They were used in the war against the Alliance of Free Planets, with the Wayfarer delivering Tof invaders to Zeltros before being destroyed by Luke Skywalker. Months later, the bulk cruiser Merriweather squared off against the New Republic's commandeered Imperial-class Star Destroyer Emancipator.
